answers.answer: I'm 31 weeks and my baby is measuring  34 weeks. My doctor is suggesting  inducing me at 39 weeks.I wonder would my baby come early since him measuring ahead?
My baby always measures 3 weeks ahead every time I have an ultrasound.

question: At last scan (33wks) the baby was measuring 35wks in tum and limb measurements then the head was 38wks. I don't have gestational diabetes and was wondering if anyone else has experienced this and whether or not their baby came earlier or they were induced.
title: Baby measuring ahead
